front.title: IEEE Standard for EthernetAmendment 1: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for Extended Ethernet Passive Optical Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3 defines the physical layer specifications and management parameters for EPON operation on point-to-multipoint passive optical networks supporting extended power budget classes of PX30, PX40, PRX40, and PR40 PMDs.
